text: Paul Friedrich may refer to: *Paul Friedrich (linguist) (1927–2016), American linguist, anthropologist and professor at Chicago University *Paul Friedrich (comic artist) (born before 2007), comic artist *Paul Frederick, Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (1800–1842), Grand Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin *Paul Leopold Friedrich (1864–1916), German surgeon and bacteriologist
title: Paul Friedrich
